first_translate: I’ll treat your poison right away...!
second_translate: I'll treat the poison right away...!

hangle: 모두들 도망가는 와중에 혼자서 저렇게 용기를 내다니.
first_translate: she’s the only one who had the courage to stay behind while everyone else ran away.
second_translate: She was the only one who had the courage to stand her ground while everyone else fled.
Excuse me, but you can't stay here!

first_translate: thank you for saving me, lady fiona...
second_translate: Thank you for saving me, Lady Fiona…

first_translate: actually, I’m the one who gave you that name.
second_translate: Actually, I was the one who gave you that name.

hangle: 죄송합니다! 바로 치료한 뒤 자리를 옮겨 드릴게요!
first_translate: I’m sorry! I’ll treat you right away and move you to a safer place!
second_translate: I'm sorry! I'll treat you right away and then move you!

hangle: 제가 지켜 줄테니, 주변은 신경 쓰지 말고 환자들을 어서 치료하도록 해요.
first_translate: I’ll protect you, so don’t worry about your surroundings and focus on treating the patients.
second_translate: I’ll protect you, so don’t worry about anything else and focus on treating the patients.

first_translate: there are some patients over there too.
second_translate: There are patients over there too.

hangle: 사실 영애에 대해 묻고 싶은 건 많지만…
first_translate: I have so many questions I want to ask you...
second_translate: I actually have many questions I want to ask, but...

hangle: 유니스를 호위하며 마물을 해치우길 몇 번.
first_translate: after escorting eunice and defeating a few demons,
second_translate: After escorting Eunice and defeating several monsters,

first_translate: no matter how many I kill, there are too many of them!
second_translate: No matter how many we take down, there are just too many!

hangle: 아까 기사가 말해준 걸 듣자하니 황실의 지원을 기대하기도 힘들 것 같은데…
first_translate: and from what the knight said earlier, it doesn’t seem like we can expect help from the palace...
second_translate: From what the knight said earlier, it seems unlikely that we can expect support from the imperial family...

first_translate: we’ve sent a message to the palace,
second_translate: We've sent a messenger to the imperial court,

hangle: 거리나 준비 문제로 즉시 오기는 힘들다고 합니다!
first_translate: but they said it would be difficult to come right away due to the distance and preparations needed!
second_translate: They said it would be difficult to come right away due to the distance and the time needed for preparations!

first_translate: on top of that, dark clouds are gathering.
second_translate: On top of that, storm clouds are rolling in.

hangle: 비가 오면 사람은 체온이 식어서 몸도 둔해지고 시야도 방해받아.
first_translate: if it rains, people’s body temperatures will drop, making them sluggish and affecting their vision.
second_translate: If it rains, people's body temperatures will drop, making them sluggish and impairing their vision.

hangle: 반면 마물은 거의 영향을 받지 않겠지.
first_translate: but the demons won’t be affected at all.
second_translate: But the demons will hardly be affected.

first_translate: I’ll think about it while fighting the demons!
second_translate: I'll think while fighting the demons!

first_translate: is it... afraid of the fire?

hangle: 확실히 저 마물은 변형되기 전에는 불이 약점이던 개체였지.
first_translate: come to think of it, that demon was weak to fire before it transformed.
second_translate: Come to think of it, that monster was weak to fire before it transformed.

hangle: 겉이 아무리 강해졌어도, 생존에 대한 본능적인 부분은 아직 남아 있을지도 몰라.
first_translate: even if its exterior has become stronger, its instinct for survival might still be there.
second_translate: Even if its exterior has become stronger, some instinctual aspects of its survival might still remain.

first_translate: the majority of the demons are wolf-like...
second_translate: The majority of the monsters are those wolf-like ones...

first_translate: it’s a bit of a crazy idea, but...
second_translate: It's a bit of a crazy plan, but...

first_translate: i-is this what I think it is?!
a love scene between the main characters?!
second_translate: A romantic scene between the main characters of the original story?!

first_translate: patients, I’m sure you were all very shocked.
second_translate: Patients, you must have been very startled.

hangle: 그치만 아쉬운 가운데 어쩐지 조금 기쁜 기분도 들어.
first_translate: but for some reason, I feel a little happy too.
second_translate: But somehow, even though I feel a bit disappointed, I also feel a little happy.

first_translate: you’re thinking of something strange again, aren’t you?
second_translate: You're thinking something weird again, aren't you?

hangle: 이상한 생각은 생각은 아니지만, 좋은 생각은 있어.
first_translate: it’s not a strange thought, but I do have a good idea.
second_translate: It's not a strange thought, but I do have a good idea.

hangle: 생각해 보니까 마물을 굳이 다 죽일 필요는 없잖아?
first_translate: come to think of it, we don’t have to kill all the demons, right?
second_translate: Come to think of it, we don’t necessarily have to kill all the monsters, do we?

first_translate: the safety of the people here is the top priority.
second_translate: The safety of the people here comes first.

hangle: 아무리 너랑 공작님의 솜씨가 훌륭해도 사람들을 전부 보호할 순 없고.
first_translate: no matter how skilled you and the duke are, you can’t protect everyone.
second_translate: No matter how skilled you and the Duke are, you can't protect everyone.

hangle: 그러니 그냥 쫓아내기만 해도 괜찮을 거 아니야.
first_translate: so it should be all right if we just chase them away.
second_translate: So just driving them away should be fine, right?

hangle: 마물들은 육체적인 능력에 비해 지능이 그렇게 높진 않아.
first_translate: demons aren’t very intelligent compared to their physical abilities.
second_translate: Monsters aren’t very intelligent compared to their physical abilities.

hangle: 이제는 통하지 않을게 분명한 약한 불꽃도 꺼리지.
first_translate: they’re wary of weak flames, even though they know it won’t work on them.
second_translate: They still shy away from weak flames, even though it’s clear they no longer work.

hangle: 경험이 풍부한 네가 그렇게 판단했다면, 그게 옳겠지.
first_translate: if that’s what you’ve concluded with your experience, then it must be right.
second_translate: If that's what you've determined based on your experience, then it must be right.

hangle: 이곳을 아주 큰 횃불로 만들어 버리자!
first_translate: let’s turn this place into a giant torch!
second_translate: Let's turn this place into a massive torch!

hangle: 이 마법을 피오나 영애가 시전하셨다고 들었는데,
first_translate: I heard lady fiona cast this spell,
second_translate: I heard that Lady Fiona cast this spell.

first_translate: I was a bit worried too,
second_translate: I was a little worried too,

first_translate: but she’s much more powerful than I thought.
second_translate: She possesses more overwhelming power than I expected.

first_translate: she’s so elegant, standing in the middle of the flames like that...
second_translate: Standing so gracefully in the midst of the flames like that...

first_translate: a normal person would be burned by the fire,
second_translate: A normal person would naturally be burned by the fire,

first_translate: but she looks so inhuman that it’s terrifying...
second_translate: She looks so inhuman, it's terrifying...

first_translate: people sometimes reject things that are different,
second_translate: People sometimes reject things that are different,

first_translate: but they are paradoxically drawn to them.
second_translate: Sometimes, people are paradoxically drawn to what they reject.

hangle: 긴 은발과 함께 휘날리는 주홍빛 불티,
first_translate: sparks of crimson flames dance with her long silver hair,
second_translate: Sparks of crimson flames dance along with her long silver hair,

hangle: 그러나 머리카락 한 올 조차 타지않는
first_translate: but not a single strand is burned.
second_translate: but not a single strand of her hair is burned.

first_translate: she’s an awe-inspiring and mysterious person.

hangle: 이 자리에 있던 사람들은 훗날 이렇게 회상한다.
first_translate: those who were there later recalled...
second_translate: Those who were present later recalled...

hangle: 타오르는 불꽃이 머리카락에 보석처럼 장식되던 그 광경은,
first_translate: ...that the sight of the blazing flames adorning her hair like jewels...
second_translate: that the sight of the blazing flames adorning her hair like jewels...
but also mesmerizing to the point of fear.
